name: Funk Campionships
description:
Controlls:

I recommend using a gamepad:

left stick - drive

right/left trigger - right/left punch

right/left bumper - right/left grab

keyboard :

player 1

WSAD - drive

QE - right/left punch

ZC - right/left grab

Enter - accept in menus

player 2

Arrow keys - drive

KL -right/left grab

IO - right/left punch

left Ctrl accept in menus
